response.original_title: All That and All There Ever Will Be
response.overview: 2 years ago, Barley's weed turned golden, and he disappeared. Now, he returns to the island, and a world who thought he was dead. Join Barley and China bud in their final adventure, as they seek answers about where they were, and try to stop Pirate Captain Willie from coming after the golden treasure once and for all!
response.title: All That and All There Ever Will Be
